title: How to Make Citrus Flan Cake

steps.headline: Combine sugar and water in a saucepan.
steps.description: Bring to a full boil on medium-high heat.

steps.headline: Reduce heat to medium-low so the sugar can caramelize.
Pour the mixture into the Baker and set aside.
Whisk some of the milk, egg yolks, condensed milk, orange zest and vanilla in a bowl.
Pour this over the sugar mix in the Baker.
Combine cake mix, milk, orange juice, and eggs.
Pour this mixture over the custard and sugar mixes in the Baker.
Loosen the edge with the knife and turn the Baker upside down so it goes on a plate.
You can accessorize with bits of lime and orange.

text: Glaze Combine sugar and water in a saucepan. Bring to a full boil on medium-high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low so the sugar can caramelize. Don't stir. Pour the mixture into the Baker and set aside. Preheat oven to 375ºF/190ºC. Custard Whisk some of the milk, egg yolks, condensed milk, orange zest and vanilla in a bowl.  Pour this over the sugar mix in the Baker.  Cake Combine cake mix, milk, orange juice, and eggs. Mix well. Pour this mixture over the custard and sugar mixes in the Baker.  Bake 30-35 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes. Loosen the edge with the knife and turn the Baker upside down so it goes on a plate.  You can accessorize with bits of lime and orange.
